meta.hint:
A prefix can be added to the beginning of a word. It changes the meaning of the word.
The prefix pre- means before. Example - Prepacked means packed before.
The prefix re- means again. Example - Redo means do again.
The prefix mis- means incorrectly or poorly. Example - Misread means read incorrectly.
meta.question: select the word that best suits the given sentence

content.description: she _____ joined the class after disconnecting.
She _____ turns back from school at 6.
